supporttools.debug=Debug Information supporttools.debuginfo=This debug information can be usefull to help XWiki Support understand the problem.

Please contact XWiki Support. supporttools.newissue.configreport=Configuration report supporttools.newissue.attachreport=Attach configuration report (only attach if not sent recently)

Please check [[your configuration settings>>url:{0}]] or contact XWiki Support.
supporttools.sendreport.button=Send Configuration Report supporttools.sendreport.title=Send Configuration Report supporttools.sendreport.confirm=Confirm sending configuration report supporttools.sendreport.info=This tools allows to send a report about your installation to XWiki SAS' support team. All information will be kept strictly confidential. supporttools.sendreport.success=The report has been sent to XWiki SAS successfully. supporttools.sendreport.fail=The report could not be sent to XWiki SAS. You can download the report below and send it by email to "support@xwiki.com". supporttools.sendreport.download=Download report
